title: HCML启动器错误解决
txt_content:
本帖最后由 SPGoding 于 2020-1-28 11:41 编辑 

[19:27:15] [AWT-EventQueue-0/INFO] Start generating launching command...
[19:27:16] [Game Launcher/INFO] Building process
[19:27:16] [Game Launcher/INFO] Logging in...
[19:27:16] [Game Launcher/INFO] Detecting libraries...
[19:27:16] [Game Launcher/INFO] Unpacking natives...
[19:27:19] [Game Launcher/INFO] *** Make shell command ***
[19:27:19] [Game Launcher/INFO] On making head command.
[19:27:19] [Game Launcher/INFO] Java Version: 1.8.0_181
[19:27:19] [Game Launcher/INFO] Java Platform: 64
[19:27:19] [Game Launcher/INFO] System Platform: 64
[19:27:19] [Game Launcher/INFO] System Physical Memory: 6120
[19:27:19] [Game Launcher/ERROR] 
---- Hello Minecraft! Crash Report ----
  Version: 2.4.1.233
  Time: 2020-01-24 19:27:19
  Thread: Thread[Game Launcher,6,main]

  Content: 
    java.lang.NullPointerException

    at java.util.StringTokenizer.<init>(Unknown Source)

    at org.jackhuang.hellominecraft.launcher.util.HMCLGameLauncher$1.run(HMCLGameLauncher.java:88)



-- System Details --
  Operating System: Windows 7 (amd64), 6.1
  Java Version: 1.8.0_181, Oracle Corporation
  Java VM Version: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (mixed mode), Oracle Corporation

一月 24, 2020 7:27:19 下午 org.jackhuang.hellominecraft.launcher.util.CrashReporter lambda$reportToServer$53

严重: Failed to post HMCL server.

java.net.UnknownHostException: huangyuhui.duapp.com
